faq.question: How can social media help my Loughrea business?

faq.question: Which social media platforms are best for Loughrea businesses?
faq.answer: For most Loughrea businesses, Facebook and Instagram are essential for reaching local customers. LinkedIn works well for B2B and professional services. TikTok and YouTube are excellent for businesses targeting younger audiences or creating video content. We'll assess your specific business and recommend the optimal platform mix.

faq.question: How often will you post on our social media accounts?
faq.answer: Posting frequency depends on the platform and your package. Typically, we recommend 4-7 posts per week on Facebook and Instagram, plus daily stories. LinkedIn requires 3-5 posts weekly, while TikTok and Twitter need more frequent content. We develop a custom posting schedule that maintains engagement without overwhelming your Loughrea audience.

faq.question: Will you respond to comments and messages on our behalf?
faq.answer: Yes! Community management is a crucial part of our service. We monitor your social accounts daily and respond to comments, messages, and reviews professionally and promptly. We'll work with you to establish response guidelines that match your brand voice and handle any sensitive situations appropriately.

faq.question: How much should we budget for social media advertising?
faq.answer: For Loughrea businesses, we typically recommend starting with €300-€800 per month for Facebook and Instagram advertising. This budget allows us to test different ad formats, target audiences effectively, and generate meaningful results. Larger campaigns or competitive industries may require €1,500-€5,000+ monthly. We'll help determine the right budget for your goals.

faq.question: Can you help with photography and video content?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer professional content production services including photography, video filming and editing, graphic design, and animation. Whether you need product photos, behind-the-scenes videos, or promotional content, our creative team handles all aspects of production for your Loughrea business.

faq.question: How do you measure the success of social media campaigns?
faq.answer: We track comprehensive metrics including reach, engagement rates, follower growth, website traffic from social, lead generation, conversion rates, and ultimately ROI. You'll receive detailed monthly reports showing how social media contributes to your business goals, with clear insights and recommendations for continued growth.
